data_sources.description: Dataset containing images of 29 different signs in American Sign Language, including letters A-Z and additional signs for space, delete, and nothing.

data_variables.name: data_dir
data_variables.description: Path to the directory containing the dataset.

data_variables.name: target_size
data_variables.description: Target size for image resizing before feeding to the model, set to 64x64 pixels.

data_variables.name: target_dims
data_variables.description: Dimensions of the input images with RGB channels, defined as (64, 64, 3).

data_variables.name: n_classes
data_variables.description: Total number of classes in the dataset, representing different signs.

data_variables.name: val_frac
data_variables.description: Fraction of the dataset used for validation, set to 10%.

data_variables.name: batch_size
data_variables.description: Number of samples per gradient update, set to 64.

data_variables.name: train_generator
data_variables.description: Data generator for the training set, applying image augmentation.

data_variables.name: val_generator
data_variables.description: Data generator for the validation set.

data_variables.name: my_model
data_variables.description: The neural network model defined using Keras Sequential API for classification of the signs.

data_flow.flows_to: fitting model using fit_generator() to train and validate the model.
